notes: Upscale, fully renovated apartment with high-end finishes including custom built-in cabinetry, modern recessed lighting, and quality furniture. The space appears clean with good natural light from large windows. For baby safety, the balcony visible in image 4 has glass doors that can be secured, and furniture has mostly rounded edges; however, the low coffee tables and open shelving with decorative items may need childproofing.
